title: Onions Are the Devil - Gregway
description:
Onions. Are. The. Worst.

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE/MERCH

Leave your questions for Greg in the comments and check back every Wednesday and Friday to see what he's saying.

Subscribe to Greg's channel: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy

Our Merch Store is live: http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

The Vlog playlist: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOlEpGVXWUVv1g9oZi6O95CwRHQd0ulT6

Subscribe: http://www.youtube.com/user/GameOverGreggy

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

transcript_chunks.text: what's up everybody Welcome to GameOverGreggy so I hate onions I there was a time where I literally you know wanted to get this internet Fame a little bit going this D-list internet Fame I I kicked around the idea of starting like just the anti-onion movement cuz I don't mind if you like onions I'm totally cool with you enjoying an onion now and again doing whatever you want with it but the problem I have with the onions is that they're automatically put on so many things so the movement I wanted to start would've been something along of you know like the no mandatory onion campaign group uh CAC you see like when when you take an onion and you cut it up into a slice and you put it on a burger or a sandwich or into a marmalade it ruins everything it touches it like once it touches lettuce and you take it off the lettuce and throw it away the lettuce still tastes like onions and here's the real your fingers then smell like the onion as well you've touched it it's now

it touches lettuce and you take it off the lettuce and throw it away the lettuce still tastes like onions and here's the real thing your fingers then smell like the onion as well you've touched it it's now infected your pores I I ate pizza tonight now here and here's like the one exception of the rule onions on Pizza it's okay for some reason that bakes it out it's fine but I'm talking about like a raw onion this is what I'm talking about a raw onion you order burger a sandwich somewhere a hot dog it should never be automatically on there it should be you have to ask for the onion I don't like that I have to ask to have the onion removed cuz even when I ask 97% of the time it's forgotten about and then like what I'm saying it smells your hand smells it'll be hours days later that you will sniff your hand and it I'm this is like the stink Palm from M. Night Shyamalan no matter how much you wash your hand it still smells like an onion you can't get away from the onion smell it infects everything it

sniff your hand and it I'm this is like the stink Palm from Mr. Rats no matter how much you wash your hand it still smells like an onion you can't get away from the onion smell it infects everything it touches and so this is my problem with the onion is that I enjoy an onion ring every now and again I think the fried kills it most of the time unless you get like the fancy tempura ones then it's way too much onion the onion's too thick it's too raw and I I like them on the pizza fun but anywhere else man these things they ruin everything they touch so what I need everyone to do is write to their congressman and such and say onions are fine onions are good we don't I need to work on a rhyme but you know something along the lines of don't eat onions and everything all right like you should have to ask for an onion ask for an onion that could be the campaign ask for onion.com if if that's not taken by a porn site but it probably is I don't like onions so there you have it ladies and

Have to ask for an onion, ask for an Onion.com if if that's not taken by a porn site, but it probably is. I don't like onions, so there you have it, ladies and gentlemen, that's a GameOverGreggy every Wednesday and Friday I come here and I rant to you about whatever I want to, maybe it's onions, maybe it's Portillo, who knows? But you know, thanks for watching and such, GameOverGreggy.
